trends: There have been no other sightings in Long Grove
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 5am in east sky,watched with wife until daylight and lost sight 615am did anyone else see report it?
divs: Sighting DetailsI thought it was a plane but it didn't move. I pulled out binocs and watched this, what I thought was a plane heading east over the lake. It never moved it just flashed red, blue, white lights. So I pulled out my video camera to video tape which I did. I even have a plane come into view twice but it never moved it just hover. I didn't know who to call or question what we were seeing. Chicago executive airport is close in Wheeling, IL and I thought this was going to land there but it just hovered from 5:00am until light around 6:15 and when sun came up lights were gone. But when the sun was rising you could see the stars disapear but this object and the moon were the only thing left as the sun rose. This was not venus this object had a red, blue and white lights.
